interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: [Marshique] Eyelash & Eyebrow Growth Serum 0.25 Fl Oz - Oil Free Formula Essence Conditioner for Extension & Perm Treatment Care
Review Date: 2020/12/20
Store: Marshique
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Marshique', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Package Type': 'Box', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.59 x 1.54 x 0.75 inches; 0.63 Ounces', 'Item model number': '0000'}
Review Text: This eyelash serum from Marshique is super simple to use and easy to make part of your nightly routine.  I have sensitive skin and have not had any reaction applying this to my lashes and brows.  I haven't seen much difference yet, but I am hoping it will help my eyebrows not look so thin.
Review Title: Easy to use!
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
BeautyBio GloPRO Regeneration Tools {'Product Dimensions': '9.88 x 2.38 x 7.88 inches; 1.3 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'ZumYu', 'Batteries': '2 AAA batteries required. (included)', 'UPC': '810813030237 851262002673', 'Manufacturer': 'BeautyBio', 'Country of Origin': 'China'} This is a very nice Microneedling tool. Although it is probably more of an exfoliation than a true microneedling session by a pro, it definitely makes a difference. No redness, no swelling and no bleeding. Skin was definitely softer after use and moisturizer was absorbed better and more thoroughly.

The 2 different sized rollers and red light therapy are a nice bonus.

Recommend. Really nice Replacement Toothbrush Heads Compatible For Oral-B Braun Electric Toothbrush ,Sensitive brush heads Extra soft bristles. 8 Count YuanJian {'Brand': 'YuanJian', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Kid', 'Item Firmness Description': 'Extra Soft', 'Number of Pieces': '8', 'Item Form': 'ROUND', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.43 x 0.39 x 2.76 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'UPC': '633337444805'} Overall a decent alternative to the originals. My brush's didn't feel extremely soft but they weren't stiff or hard either. To me they compare the normal brush head stiffness of original Oral B heads.

I still prefer the floss head type, but these will work just fine. Good replacement brush 1 Ounce Hyaluronic Acid Serum for Skin – Hydrating Facial Moisturizer with Anti-Aging Skin Care Properties. Beauty and Skin Care Temer {'Brand': 'Temer', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Active Ingredients': 'Hyaluronic_acid', 'Unit Count': '1 Fl. Oz', 'Number of Items': '1'} I really like this Hyaluronic Acid Serum for the face. I haven't used it long enough to comment on the anti-aging effectiveness, but it does sink into my skin very fast. It does not leave a sticky feeling and makes your skin soft and smooth. Absorbs quickly! Mountain Falls Regular Dip-It Nail Polish Remover for Natural Nails, with Vitamin E and Panthenol, 6 Fluid Ounce Mountain Falls ["Don't wait for your next spa day to treat yourself. Mountain Falls Regular Nail Polish Remover Dip-It has been carefully formulated to quickly and gently care for your nails. The salon quality formula softens cuticles and contains Vitamin E. Our formula is free of preservatives, Parabens, and Phthalates. Try Mountain Falls Regular Nail Polish Remover Dip-It today."] {'Package Dimensions': '3.4 x 3 x 3 inches; 7.2 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Vi-Jon'} I use to buy this kind of product in the past and was just as pleased as I remember! Easy to use and no mess. Just stick your nail in and after a few twists all the polish is removed. Nice, convenient and a great price! Quick results! Natwag Makeup Remover Pads,18 Pack 3.74 Inch Reusable Microfiber Cleansing Pad with Laundry Bag Suitable for All Skin Types,3 Color Facial Cleansing Pad Set. Natwag {'Brand': 'Natwag', 'Skin Type': 'All Skin,Dry', 'Material Feature': 'Reusable', 'Unit Count': '18.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '18', 'Package Dimensions': '4.4 x 4.37 x 2.59 inches; 3.84 Ounces', 'UPC': '745103569701'} I love these makeup remover pads from Natwag! My college age daughter bought some and they worked great for her, so I decided to try them too. I was surprised at how easily they remove makeup. I really like that I will not have to buy cotton pads anymore. They come will a really nice zippered bag to wash them in. Overall, I'm very happy and would recommend to anyone! Awesome! Foot Peel Mask For Cracked Heels, Dead Skin & Calluses - Make Your Feet Baby Soft & Get a Smooth Skin, Removes & Repairs Rough Heels Monikahair {'UPC': '739515020639'} I live in a really dry climate so my skin gets dry and cracked easily. I also like to wear flip flops a lot which makes my feet especially dried out. I used the Baby Feet and two days later the peeling began. I think Im on day four now and they are almost done peeling. My feet already look so much better and feel so much softer. I would definitely use again in the future! Works amazingly well! [Marshique] Eyelash & Eyebrow Growth Serum 0.25 Fl Oz - Oil Free Formula Essence Conditioner for Extension & Perm Treatment Care Marshique {'Brand': 'Marshique', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Package Type': 'Box', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.59 x 1.54 x 0.75 inches; 0.63 Ounces', 'Item model number': '0000'} This eyelash serum from Marshique is super simple to use and easy to make part of your nightly routine. I have sensitive skin and have not had any reaction applying this to my lashes and brows. I haven't seen much difference yet, but I am hoping it will help my eyebrows not look so thin. Easy to use!
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Interest:** The user has broadened their interest in skincare to encompass products for eyelash and eyebrow care, complementing their existing focus on skincare and beauty tools. They continue to prioritize nail and foot care, emphasizing products that address dryness and roughness, while maintaining a keen interest in reusable cleansing tools and hydrating anti-aging serums, aligned with sustainability in personal care.

- **User Preference:** They prefer gentle, effective, and sustainable solutions that enhance skin softness and absorption. This includes treatments for foot care and extends to eye care, reflecting an increased awareness of overall skin health and eco-friendly practices.

- **Positive Experience Indicators:** The user appreciates multifunctional products that yield noticeable results and express satisfaction with their recent experiences in various categories, including eyelash and eyebrow care. They value effectiveness coupled with comfort, highlighting their preference for products that deliver tangible benefits without irritation.

- **Performance Expectations:** They expect consistent, clear results across all personal care categories, reaffirming their standards for quality, especially in new areas like eye care.

- **Recommendation Behavior:** They are inclined to recommend reliable products that embody innovation, particularly those that offer effective, convenient solutions for enhancing their holistic self-care rituals, including eye care.

The user’s evolving interests illustrate a commitment to comprehensive personal care that harmonizes efficacy with sustainability, showcasing a well-rounded approach to beauty and skincare.
